publication.citation: Rijcklof Hofman (rev. Pádraic Moran), 'Glosses on Priscian, Ars grammatica, in St Gall, Stiftsbibliothek, 904'

about.p: Glosses from Priscian books 1–5 were previously published in R. Hofman, The Sankt Gall Priscian Commentary. Part 1 (2 vols, Münster, 1996). All glosses were previously published in St Priscian Glosses, created by Pádraic Moran originally in 2010, afterwards supplemented.
